Articles.Content:
Looking for 2 mods, hoping that they exists.

I haven't been able to find any yet.

1. A mod that tells you how long there is until sunset / sunrise.

2. A mod that gives some more specific details about your current target. (Name, distance, velocity, inclination, eccentricity and so on), I'm well away that most of these are already viewable via the map. However, I would love it if I could see it without having to find my target on the map.

If these mods exists, even partially, please give me a link if you can.

I believe Kerbal Engineer redux will do the second one, not sure about the first.

Linky!

I believe Kerbal Engineer redux will do the second one, not sure about the first.

Linky!

Thx, I'll give it a go...
